question:
Index of Industrial Production:
  1. is also described as producer's Index
  2. is released monthly by the Central Statistics Office
  3. has three main categories of items viz. mining, manufacturing and electricity
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
The Index of Industrial Production (IIP) is an index for India which details out the growth of various sectors in an economy such as mining, electricity and manufacturing. It is compiled and published monthly by the Central Statisticas Office (CSO). Since the IIP measures production in the industrial sector, it is also described as the producer's index.
